Passing the list of images to pb-facsimile

Usually the facsimiles to be shown are registered with pb-facsimile by outputting a pb-facs-link web component via the ODD. In most cases this is done when processing a TEI pb or surface. The name of the image will be taken from the @facs attribute and copied to the pb-facs-link. To resolve the full API link, pb-facsimile prepends the base-uri configured on it. However, you can also specify an absolute URL on the pb-facs-link. Read more about troubleshooting IIIF links in the FAQ.
